en: Well, I'm glad to know that you're all okay.

You guys tried to prevent the crystals from
being stolen, but <c=violastro>that thief</c> got away, didn't
he?

I heard about what happened when I ran into
<c=131,42,13>Hickory</c> on my way to <c=pistachio>my little sister</c>.

I don't know what I'd do if something were to
happen to her...
Please be careful on your adventures!
